name: Global Anthro Notes Project
body:
### Welcome to the Global Anthro Notes Project
[Paratext Anthro Note Google Sheet (SIL-only)](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1qk3G-uDbEQUER4-ojHVxw9AQVH2RYIkL4ILng5graP0/edit#gid=1428504785&vpid=C2)

[Paratext Anthro Notes (html)](notes/)

Latest SPUD: [ptwAnthroNotes7.6.54.506.SPUD (@ 7.6.54.80)](http://update.ubs-icap.org/DeveloperUseOnly/ptwAnthroNotes7.6.54.506.SPUD)
(Send/Receive GANed)

Global Anthro Notes Installation:

1. [Download Latest GAN zip](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0BxKtjmBey1gkOWw1UDM0eHpIWWs/view?usp=sharing)
1. Extract to your "My Paratext Projects" folder
1. In Paratext, File > Open File/Resource... to a scripture project or resource
1. View > Show Consultant Notes > GAN (Global Anthro Notes)
1. Navigate to Luke 1:1 in the scripture project or resource

[LCO to OCM](lco-ocm/)

[ANQR wiki](https://www.wiki.insitehome.org/display/IntlAnthro/ANQR+Resource+Library)

### Authors and Contributors
Eric Pyle (@ericpyle)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
